description: Ready to succeed in school? Lower your stress while improving your confidence and your grades with these scientifically based study and test taking skills. Enjoy short, easy lectures that help you study quickly, memorize with confidence and take tests like a professional.  Students have used these skills to rise to the top of the classes, win competitive scholarships, overcome school difficulties and achieve great results. Taught by School Skills founder and author Chris Tobias, this course can be used by students at any level who want to improve.  Parents can also use these skills to help coach their students into new levels of achievement.
title: Test Turbocharger: Improve Your Exam and Test Scores Today!
